channel.title: Service Desk Holiday Closure
channel.description:
Hi all,
Please note that the IATI Service Desk will be closed between 23rd December and 1st January (inclusive) and will be open again as normal on 2nd January.
We will respond to any queries received over the closure period as soon as possible once it is reopened.
We hope everyone has a wonderful holiday period!
Many thanks, The Tech Team :christmas_tree::star::gift::snowman:
